scripts.start: echo Entering the goblin pit...&& npx nodemon servah.js
scripts.build: echo Da smartuns iz mashin ya code togeva! && webpack
scripts.dev: echo Da smartuns iz gawpin ya grotty code! && webpack --watch
scripts.watch: echo Da gremlinz iz greasin' up the wallz && npx tailwindcss -i ./fings/css/input.css -o ./fings/css/output.css --watch
